verses.verse: And I saw <S%G1492><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> the Lamb <S%G721><s%> opened <S%G455><s%> one <S%G3391><s%> of the seals, <S%G4973><s%> and I heard, <S%G191><s%> as it were the noise <S%G5456><s%> of thunder, <S%G1027><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the four <S%G5064><s%> beasts <S%G2226><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Come <S%G2064><s%> and see. <S%G991><s%>

And I saw, <S%G1492><s%> and behold <S%G2400><s%> a white <S%G3022><s%> horse: <S%G2462><s%> and he that sat <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> him had <S%G2192><s%> a bow; <S%G5115><s%> and a crown <S%G4735><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> to him: and he went <S%G1831><s%> forth <S%G1831><s%> conquering, <S%G3528><s%> and to conquer. <S%G3528><s%>

And when <S%G3753><s%> he had opened <S%G455><s%> the second <S%G1208><s%> seal, <S%G4973><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> the second <S%G1208><s%> beast <S%G2226><s%> say, <S%G3004><s%> Come <S%G2064><s%> and see. <S%G991><s%>

And there went <S%G1831><s%> out another <S%G243><s%> horse <S%G2462><s%> that was red: <S%G4450><s%> and power was given <S%G1325><s%> to him that sat <S%G2521><s%> thereon <S%G1909><s%> <S%G846><s%> to take <S%G2983><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> from the earth, <S%G1093><s%> and that they should kill <S%G4969><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another: <S%G240><s%> and there was given <S%G1325><s%> to him a great <S%G3173><s%> sword. <S%G3162><s%>

And when <S%G3753><s%> he had opened <S%G455><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> seal, <S%G4973><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> beast <S%G2226><s%> say, <S%G3004><s%> Come <S%G2064><s%> and see. <S%G991><s%> And I beheld, <S%G1492><s%> and see <S%G2400><s%> a black <S%G3189><s%> horse; <S%G2462><s%> and he that sat <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> him had <S%G2192><s%> a pair <S%G2218><s%> of balances in his hand. <S%G5495><s%>

And I heard <S%G191><s%> a voice <S%G5456><s%> in the middle <S%G3319><s%> of the four <S%G5064><s%> beasts <S%G2226><s%> say, <S%G3004><s%> A measure <S%G5518><s%> of wheat <S%G4621><s%> for a penny, <S%G1220><s%> and three <S%G5140><s%> measures <S%G5518><s%> of barley <S%G2915><s%> for a penny; <S%G1220><s%> and see you hurt <S%G91><s%> not the oil <S%G1637><s%> and the wine. <S%G3631><s%>

And when <S%G3753><s%> he had opened <S%G455><s%> the fourth <S%G5067><s%> seal, <S%G4973><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> the voice <S%G5456><s%> of the fourth <S%G5067><s%> beast <S%G2226><s%> say, <S%G3004><s%> Come <S%G2064><s%> and see. <S%G991><s%>

And I looked, <S%G1492><s%> and behold <S%G2400><s%> a pale <S%G5515><s%> horse: <S%G2462><s%> and his name <S%G3686><s%> that sat <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1883><s%> him was Death, <S%G2288><s%> and Hell <S%G86><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> with him. And power <S%G1849><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> to them over <S%G1909><s%> the fourth <S%G5067><s%> part of the earth, <S%G1093><s%> to kill <S%G615><s%> with sword, <S%G4501><s%> and with hunger, <S%G3042><s%> and with death, <S%G2288><s%> and with the beasts <S%G2342><s%> of the earth. <S%G1093><s%>

And when <S%G3753><s%> he had opened <S%G455><s%> the fifth <S%G3991><s%> seal, <S%G4973><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> under <S%G5270><s%> the altar <S%G2379><s%> the souls <S%G5590><s%> of them that were slain <S%G4969><s%> for the word <S%G3056><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and for the testimony <S%G3141><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> they held: <S%G2192><s%>

And they cried <S%G2896><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> How <S%G2193><s%> long, <S%G2193><s%> O Lord, <S%G1203><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> and true, <S%G228><s%> do you not judge <S%G2919><s%> and avenge <S%G1556><s%> our blood <S%G129><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> them that dwell <S%G2730><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth? <S%G1093><s%>

And white <S%G3022><s%> robes <S%G4749><s%> were given <S%G1325><s%> to every <S%G1538><s%> one of them; and it was said <S%G4483><s%> to them, that they should rest <S%G373><s%> yet <S%G2089><s%> for a little <S%G3398><s%> season, <S%G5550><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> their fellow servants <S%G4889><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> and their brothers, <S%G80><s%> that should <S%G3195><s%> be killed <S%G615><s%> as they were, should be fulfilled. <S%G4137><s%>

And I beheld <S%G1492><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> he had opened <S%G455><s%> the sixth <S%G1623><s%> seal, <S%G4973><s%> and, see, <S%G2400><s%> there was a great <S%G3173><s%> earthquake; <S%G4578><s%> and the sun <S%G2246><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> black <S%G3189><s%> as sackcloth <S%G4526><s%> of hair, <S%G5155><s%> and the moon <S%G4582><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> as blood; <S%G129><s%>

And the stars <S%G792><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> to the earth, <S%G1093><s%> even as a fig <S%G4808><s%> tree <S%G4808><s%> casts <S%G906><s%> her untimely <S%G3653><s%> figs, <S%G3653><s%> when she is shaken <S%G4579><s%> of a mighty <S%G3173><s%> wind. <S%G417><s%>

And the heaven <S%G3772><s%> departed <S%G673><s%> as a scroll <S%G975><s%> when it is rolled <S%G1507><s%> together; and every <S%G3956><s%> mountain <S%G3735><s%> and island <S%G3520><s%> were moved <S%G2795><s%> out of their places. <S%G5117><s%>

And the kings <S%G935><s%> of the earth, <S%G1093><s%> and the great <S%G3175><s%> men, and the rich <S%G4145><s%> men, and the chief <S%G5506><s%> captains, <S%G5506><s%> and the mighty <S%G1415><s%> men, and every <S%G3956><s%> slave, <S%G1401><s%> and every <S%G3956><s%> free <S%G1658><s%> man, hid <S%G2928><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%> in the dens <S%G4693><s%> and in the rocks <S%G4073><s%> of the mountains; <S%G3735><s%>

And said <S%G3004><s%> to the mountains <S%G3735><s%> and rocks, <S%G4073><s%> Fall <S%G4098><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> us, and hide <S%G2928><s%> us from the face <S%G4383><s%> of him that sits <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the throne, <S%G2362><s%> and from the wrath <S%G3709><s%> of the Lamb: <S%G721><s%>
For the great <S%G3173><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> of his wrath <S%G3709><s%> is come; <S%G2064><s%> and who <S%G5101><s%> shall be able <S%G1410><s%> to stand? <S%G2476><s%>
